dataset.description: Open-source web application supporting human services transportation (HST) trip exchange workflows, authentication, and provider coordination. Data outputs will be published in open, platform-independent formats (CSV, JSON, XML, TXT, PDF, JPEG, PNG) with no PII or sensitive data, and preserved in the National Transportation Library (NTL) with persistent identifiers.
dataset.rights: No sensitive data; no PII. Open access per project plan.

distribution.description: Source code repository; includes build artifacts and documentation. Data outputs will be posted in open formats (CSV, JSON, XML, TXT, PDF, JPEG, PNG) per project plan.
distribution.title: Trip Exchange Front-End Source and Documentation

distribution.description: Planned preservation location (National Transportation Library) for project datasets; persistent identifier to be registered upon deposit.
distribution.title: National Transportation Library Archive (planned)
